--- In gladiator@y..., "dph_of_rules" <dph_of_rules@u...> wrote:
> This is maddening.  My computer clock is being affected by the game 
> Gladiator.  Apparantly, I'm the only person who hashad this problem.

Ok, I've narrowed the cause of the problem.  It only happens after I 
exit the game after I have let the program run 2-3+ hours.  Anybody 
out there with ideas about how to solve the problem besides going 
online to get the time corrected?
